name: glissando
description:
glissando

Notes without clefs mean nothing.

A relaxing, sliding puzzle game for Windows. Get the music note to the clef.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to slide. Further instructions within the game.
  • ESC to pause and CTRL+R to restart level.

Save progess

  • Progress is automatically saved after completing each level. If you ever want to restart the game from scratch, just go to %AppData% (normally in C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Local) and delete the "Slide" folder.

Credits

  • All mentioned in the game (main menu). Backgrounds by craftpix.net and fonts from dafont.com. Music by Eric Satie performed by me on the piano.
